column4: Running "install /boot/grub/stage1 (hd0) (hd0)1+17 p (hd0,8)/boot/grub/stage2 /boot/grub/menu.lst"... failed     Error 12: Invalid device requested.
do you want to reinstall grub from rescue-system?
do you have a terminal/konsole open? if not, open one
good. do the following: sudo mount /dev/sdaX /mnt   /dev/sdaX is your Drive on which grup should install
now do sudo chroot /mnt  you chrooted now into /mnt. here you can install grub, likly with grub-install /dev/sda  (or which device you have..)
that works for me always fine :)
